something and pay attention to it so

it's look at that dog to see means to
notice something using our eyes so this
one's more by chance maybe remember this

they're conjugations and their

her with my eyes now what
watch is very similar to to look however
the way we use them slightly different
to what means we look at something for a

one of my favorite things to do is to
